Tunable.name: LIGHT_STATE_STAT
Tunable.description: The stat name used to manipulate the lights' on and off states that control the effects they may or may not play

TunableEnum.name: MANUAL_LIGHT_TAG
TunableEnum.description: The tag that is used to mark lighting objects that do not have any automatic behavior such as following auto-light interactions.

TunableEnum.name: NON_ELECTRIC_LIGHT_TAG
TunableEnum.description: The tag that is used to determine if the lights goes off when the power is shut down.
